DOC.brief_summary: The application of Ease-it Spray will alleviate pain secondary to fire ant stings more quickly than placebo.
DOC.brief_title: Ease-it Spray for the Treatment of Fire Ant Stings
DOC.criteria: AD soldier in US Army Ages 1860 Volunteer Absence of serious medical condition Past allergic reactions Asthma History of (h/o) IFA sting Inability to provide informed consent Known h/o hymenoptera allergic reaction Allergy to any component of the treatments Inability to followup Active medical condition Pregnancy
